availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Kinley J. Tener (Philadelphia County, Pennsylvania, clerk, student, and attorney)

body.p: Philadelphia County, Pennsylvania, clerk, student, and attorney. Native of Ireland. Son of Richard Tener. Clerk in Philadelphia County, Pennsylvania, in 1860. Clerk in the firm of Tener & Davis in Philadephia in 1861. Law student in Philadelphia County in 1863. Law student in Philadelphia County in 1864. Attorney in Philadelphia County in 1865.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Pennsylvania, Philadelphia County, Philadelphia, p. 299.
